name: Fireboi Escapes the Lab
description:
The lab is flooding! With the water level rising every 10 seconds, Fireboi only has a couple minutes to escape before he is extinguished. He must use his wits and shoot his fireballs to solve simple puzzles and climb his way up to freedom!

Controls: 

WASD to move

SHIFT to run

SPACE to jump

hold down LEFT MOUSE BUTTON to charge

let go of LEFT MOUSE BUTTON to shoot a fireball

Enjoy!
